sn5.5:1.2: Atha kho uppalavanna bhikkhuni pubbanhasamayam nivasetva …pe…
sn5.5:1.4: Atha kho maro papima uppalavannaya bhikkhuniya bhayam chambhitattam lomahamsam uppadetukamo samadhimha cavetukamo yena uppalavanna bhikkhuni tenupasankami; upasankamitva uppalavannam bhikkhunim gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn5.5:3.2: “ko nu khvayam manusso va amanusso va gatham bhasati”ti?
sn5.5:3.4: “maro kho ayam papima mama bhayam chambhitattam lomahamsam uppadetukamo samadhimha cavetukamo gatham bhasati”ti.
sn5.5:3.5: Atha kho uppalavanna bhikkhuni “maro ayam papima” iti viditva maram papimantam gathahi paccabhasi:
sn5.5:7.1: Atha kho maro papima “janati mam uppalavanna bhikkhuni”ti dukkhi dummano tatthevantaradhayiti.
